basejump 0.5.2
  • Reference

PANTHER Gene Ontology Annotations

Source: R/panther.R
panther.Rd

PANTHER Gene Ontology Annotations

panther(organism = c("Homo sapiens", "Mus musculus", "Caenorhabditis elegans",
  "Drosophila melanogaster"), release = NULL)

Arguments

organism

Full latin organism name (e.g. "Homo sapiens").
release

character string denoting PANTHER release version. If NULL, defaults to current release. Consult the PANTHER website for a list of release versions available from the FTP server (e.g. "13.0").

Value

data.frame.

See also

Other Gene Annotation Functions: annotable, broadClass, convertGenesToSymbols, convertTranscriptsToGenes, convertUCSCBuildToEnsembl, detectOrganism, emptyRanges, hgnc2gene, makeGRangesFromEnsembl, makeGRangesFromGFF, makeGene2symbolFromEnsembl, makeGene2symbolFromGFF, makeTx2geneFromEnsembl, makeTx2geneFromGFF, mgi2gene, parseGFFAttributes, stripTranscriptVersions

Examples

invisible(capture.output(
    x <- panther("Homo sapiens")
))
#> Downloading PANTHER annotations
#> Downloading PTHR13.1_human.gz
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   pantherID = col_character(),
#>   X2 = col_character(),
#>   pantherSubfamily = col_character(),
#>   pantherFamilyName = col_character(),
#>   pantherSubfamilyName = col_character(),
#>   goMF = col_character(),
#>   goBP = col_character(),
#>   goCC = col_character(),
#>   pantherClass = col_character(),
#>   pantherPathway = col_character()
#> )
#> Obtaining HGNC to Ensembl gene ID mappings
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   .default = col_character(),
#>   date_approved_reserved = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_symbol_changed = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_name_changed = col_date(format = ""),
#>   date_modified = col_date(format = ""),
#>   entrez_id = col_integer(),
#>   homeodb = col_integer(),
#>   orphanet = col_integer()
#> )
#> See spec(...) for full column specifications.
#> Splitting and sorting the GO terms
#> goMF
#> goBP
#> goCC
#> pantherClass
#> pantherPathway
glimpse(x)
#> Observations: 19,676
#> Variables: 9

#> $ pantherSubfamily     <chr> "PTHR19282:SF169", "PTHR14064:SF3", "PTHR43398:SF1", "...
#> $ pantherFamilyName    <chr> "TETRASPANIN", "CHONDROMODULIN-RELATED", "FAMILY NOT N...
#> $ pantherSubfamilyName <chr> "TETRASPANIN-6", "TENOMODULIN", "DOLICHOL-PHOSPHATE MA...
#> $ goMF                 <list> [NULL, NULL, <"catalytic activity [GO:0003824]", "tra...
#> $ goBP                 <list> [<"biological regulation [GO:0065007]", "cell communi...
#> $ goCC                 <list> [<"cell part [GO:0044464]", "integral to membrane [GO...
#> $ pantherClass         <list> [NULL, NULL, <"glycosyltransferase [PC00111]", "trans...
#> $ pantherPathway       <list> [NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, "Parkinson disease [P0...
